CustomField.description: When an organization submits a new budget based on a smaller or larger award amount, it is usually added as an attachment. If this is checked, we need to look for attachments with new budgets
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When an organization submits a new budget based on a smaller or larger award amount, it is usually added as an attachment. If this is checked, we need to look for attachments with new budgets
CustomField.label: Revised Grant Budget Received
